PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-07152023-07-06PMO
ActStandards Council of Canada Act
PrecisOrder fixing the remuneration and certain conditions of employment of COLIN L. CLARK, member and Vice-Chairperson of the Standards Council of Canada, for the period he is acting as Chairperson, effective November 9, 2020, until such time as he is no longer required to act as Chairperson.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order fixing the remuneration and certain conditions of employment of COLIN L. CLARK, member and Vice-Chairperson of the Standards Council of Canada, for the period he is acting as Chairperson, effective November 9, 2020, until such time as he is no longer required to act as Chairperson.
